item.title: Gentoo users suck
item.description: INTRO well this is a rant about Gentoo users WHY why the fuck do you use gentoo it’s slow as fuck to compile and install software for diminishing performance gains. And don’t yap about customizability. you don’t use most of the “customizability” offered to you. And you don’t even need it. Also why do y’all have so few packages in your package manager? “But ackshualy you can compile from source after downloading the software”
